name: Corel Multimedia Manager Album
summary: Learn about .CMM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Users of older CorelDRAW versions used CMM files to create categorized collections of graphics, photos, or other multimedia content, which was especially useful when working on design projects that required many image assets. However, CorelDRAW no longer includes the Corel Multimedia Manager tool.

instructions: You can open CMM files with Corel Multimedia Manager, which is a utility included with older versions of the CorelDRAW Graphics Suite. To open a CMM file in CorelDRAW, select File â†’ Open Album.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
